entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 01:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: NW 27 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
